chunk:
Bior Nose + Face Deep Cleansing Pore Strips, Blackhead Remover, 12 Nose + 12 Face Strips

Brand: Bioré

Category: Pore Strips

Ingredients: POLYQUATERNIUM-37, SILICA, WATER, GLYCERIN, POLYSILICONE-13, PEG-12 DIMETHICONE, ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, STEARYL GLYCYRRHETINATE, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT, TITANIUM DIOXIDE
book: 0929-Bior Nose + Face Deep Cleansing Pore Strips, Blackhead Remover, 12 Nose + 12 Fac

chunk: Warnings: 1. For nose strip; use only on the nose. 2. For face strip; avoid using around the eyes. 3. Avoid using on acne blemishes or swollen, sunburned, excessively dry skin, or skin prone to spider veins. 4. Consult a physician before using on skin being treated with prescription acne medication. 5. Avoid using on skin which is sensitive to
book: 0929-Bior Nose + Face Deep Cleansing Pore Strips, Blackhead Remover, 12 Nose + 12 Fac

If strip is difficult or painful to remove, wet strip thoroughly

chunk: using on skin which is sensitive to bandages or peel-off face masks. 6. Remove strip as directed promptly after it becomes stiff.
